mapper.select: select * from user where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
select a.id ,a.name ,b.desc as role from `user` a , `role` b ,user_role_rep where a.id=user_role_rep.uid and b.id =user_role_rep.id
select * from adminmenu where id in(select id from role_menu_rep where rid in(select id from role where rid in (select id from user where username=#{username})))
select * from permission where id in(select id from role_permission_rep where rid in(select id from role where rid in (select id from user where username=#{username})))
